amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to provide any benefit described in section 1001D(b)(1)(C) of the Food Security Act of 1985 to a person or legal entity if the average adjusted gross income of the person or legal entity exceeds $250,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A060) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 228 (Roll no. 455).
